title: Automatic calls to many Google services on launch (Windows 10, desktop)
content:
Hello! Something in my Firefox installation seems to be making several Google network (google.com / forcesafesearch.google.com / www.youtube-nocookie.com / m.youtube.com, and a couple of others) calls shortly after launch. I have a DNS sinkhole, so that is how I can see.

I have a few reputable extensions (or should be, from EFF, Firefox itself, or Ublock Origin), but it also happens in safe mode. I went through a good chunk of this: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/how-stop-firefox-making-automatic-connections and still the calls occur

I am on Windows 10, with FF v93.

Thanks very much!
creator: hiciya6568

title: Default Search Engine keeps resetting.
content: I have set my default search engine as duckduckgo, however everytime I restart the browser it has reset to google. Is there any way to make the change stick?
creator: darren20

title: Extension
content:
Hola,

No logro que la extensión de una billetera aparezca en la barra. Quizás es porque la eliminé del panel. Cuando quiero que vuelva a aparecer no lo consigo.
creator: ggccvv1941

title: raither Preview file then download
content: Every time I want to open and see PDF file it gets download. I want automatic downloading to be stopped. Help suggested to use options, but I could find them.
creator: bflurn1
